replies.body:

Hey Waceded, thanks for the note, link in the article should be fixed now. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

"A New OPL Champion" I thought Riot was finally announcing our free Oceanic themed skin we were supposed to get when oceanic server went live for transferring to oce.  That Stars Kassadin is not oceanic that skin is South America,
Hey Riot, I need a Pizza Delivery right now. Please fix the link so I can order one!{{summoner:51}}
Link for the comp details does not work...
